item.title: Accessing Smart City Services in Untrustworthy Environments via Decentralized Privacy-Preserving Overlay Networks
item.description: We’re happy to announce that our paper “Accessing Smart City Services in Untrustworthy Environments via Decentralized Privacy-Preserving Overlay Networks” has been published in the proceedings of the 2021 IEEE International Conference on Service-Oriented System Engineering (SOSE)". Within this paper, we presented how our approach can be used to provide the foundations for a network of Smart City Services.
